roleset.name: to uncover
roleset.note: UNEARTH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'unearth' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from unearth.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: It began in 1973 , when he was being considered [*-1] for deputy mayor , and a routine check unearthed the extraordinary fact that he had n't paid his income tax for the previous four years [*T*-2].
example.arg: the extraordinary fact that he had n't paid his income tax for the previous four years
